name: Now Type!
description:
High-Score Typing Practice

Great for beginners and fun for those looking to improve their typing speed.

Features:

-> Pre-Made Tests*: Includes tests made especially for beginners and up.

-> Finger Guides**: Hand overlays show which finger you should be using to help the learner type correctly.

-> Custom Tests***: Make your own tests! Copy and paste a list. Such as state names, spelling test vocabulary, long science words for university, etc...

-> High Scores: All tests, including custom tests, keep track of the best scores for each test. Compete against your family or classmates.

-> Fun Graphics: Keeps younger learners interested and coming back for more.

Made by a Teacher: All of my apps are made by a teacher (me) and tested in a classroom with many students.

-> No Adds, No IAPs: My apps are designed to be used in an educational environment, so I use a buy once and get everything policy.

==========================

*Some keyboards do not have all the keys needed for some tests.

**Finger hints are based on a US QWERTY keyboard layout.

***Custom tests only support standard ASCII characters.
